entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:20 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -32.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -37.7°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
